message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. It's a steal at this price, if I do say so myself!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $200 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $180. It's a great compromise, if you ask me!
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice! I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to go down to $150?
